items.title: IEEE Signal Processing Cup 2025
items.description: Selected as one of the three finalist teams in the IEEE Signal Processing Cup 2025, competing at IEEE ICASSP 2025.

items.title: Intra BUET CTF 2023
items.description: Our team became 1st Runners Up among the 35 teams in Intra BUET CTF 2023 organized by BUET Cyber Security Club.

items.title: BD-Flag Hunt 2021
items.description: Our team Noobies became 9th among 100+ teams in BD-Flag Hunt 2021 organized by CTF community of Bangladesh.

items.title: Dean's List Award
items.description: Awarded Dean's List merit scholarship three times for academic performance in BUET.

items.title: Microcontroller, Microprocessor and Embedding System Sessional Project
items.description: Our project '6 DOF Robotic Arm mounted on a bot' was awarded Honorable Mention in the Microcontroller, Microprocessor and Embedding System Sessional Project of CSE Department, BUET.

items.title: Achieved a highest Codeforces rating of 1400, earning the rank of Specialist
